name: Ant-Man
text: Puny Pest - Response: After you change to this form, remove 1 threat from a scheme.
real_text: Puny Pest - Response: After you change to this form, remove 1 threat from a scheme.
flavor: "Why don't you pick on somebody your own size?"

name: Scott Lang
text: Time to Unwind - Response: After you change to this form, heal 1 damage from Scott Lang.
real_text: Time to Unwind - Response: After you change to this form, heal 1 damage from Scott Lang.
flavor: "being Cassie's hero is all I've ever wanted."

name: Ant-Man
text: Giant Nuisance - Response: After you change to this form, deal 1 damage to an enemy.
real_text: Giant Nuisance - Response: After you change to this form, deal 1 damage to an enemy.
flavor: "Oh Yeah, tiny dude is big now!"

name: Giant Stomp
text:
Play only if you are in Giant hero form.
Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to each minion. Deal 8 damage to an enemy.
real_text:
Play only if you are in Giant hero form.
Hero Action (attack): Deal 1 damage to each minion. Deal 8 damage to an enemy.
flavor: "I'd run if I were you." - Scott Lang

name: Hive Mind
text:
Play only if you are in Tiny hero form.
Hero Action
real_text:
Play only if you are in Tiny hero form.
Hero Action

name: Resize
text: Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Draw 1 card.
real_text: Hero Action: Change to your other hero form. Draw 1 card.

name: Pym Particles
text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from your hero if you are in Giant hero form or draw 1 card if you are in Tiny hero form.
real_text: Hero Response: After you spend this card, heal 2 damage from your hero if you are in Giant hero form or draw 1 card if you are in Tiny hero form.

name: Ant-Man's Helmet
text:
Hero Response: After you change to Giant hero form, heal 2 damage from your hero.
Hero Response: After you change to Tiny hero form, draw 1 card.
real_text:
Hero Response: After you change to Giant hero form, heal 2 damage from your hero.
Hero Response: After you change to Tiny hero form, draw 1 card.

name: Wrist Gauntlets
text:
Hero Action: If you are in Giant hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [physical][physical] resources → stun an enemy.
Hero Action: If you are in Tiny hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [energy][energy] resources → confuse an enemy.
real_text:
Hero Action: If you are in Giant hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [physical][physical] resources → stun an enemy.
Hero Action: If you are in Tiny hero form, exhaust Wrist Gauntlets and spend [energy][energy] resources → confuse an enemy.

name: Ant-Man
text:
Ant-Man gets +1 hit point for each pym counter on him.
Interrupt: When Ant-Man enters play, place 1 pym counter on him (to a maximum of 4) for each resource you overpaid for Ant-Man's cost.
real_text:
Ant-Man gets +1 hit point for each pym counter on him.
Interrupt: When Ant-Man enters play, place 1 pym counter on him (to a maximum of 4) for each resource you overpaid for Ant-Man's cost.

name: Giant-Man
text: Giant-Man gets +2 ATK while he has 3 or more remaining hit points.
real_text: Giant-Man gets +2 ATK while he has 3 or more remaining hit points.
flavor: "Size isn't everything. Unless you're stepping over a bridge."

name: Stinger
text:
Play only if your identity has the Avenger trait.
Stinger does not count against your ally limit.
real_text:
Play only if your identity has the Avenger trait.
Stinger does not count against your ally limit.

name: Reinforced Suit
text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +2 hit points.
real_text:
Attach to an ally. Max 1 per ally.
Attached ally gets +2 hit points.
flavor: "Remember, it's not just the suit that gives you power, it's how you use it." - Hank Pym
illustrator: Christopher Allen, Guru FX, & Roberto Poggi

name: Team-Building Exercise
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Team-Building Exercise → play a card from your hand that shares a trait with your hero, reducing its resource cost by 1.
